column2: it was maybe a couple of days ago one of my friends made a comment about me that I didn't think was very nice so I got kind of upset
probably last week when i was with my family
some days it's great and some days it's not we have finals coming up soon so lately it's been little bit more difficult I guess because lot of thoughts on my mind at night
probably procrastinating so much on my homework it just feels like there's so much to do
